channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Speed bump causes noise of cars, 23rd August
item.description:
Hi team, the speed bumps are separate bumps instead of one big bump, therefore cars, buses and motorcycles continue to drive way too fast. They can avoid the bumps which causes a lot of noise and dangerous situations as cars drive in the middle of the road to avoid the bumps which is dangerous for other traffic. As cars continue to drive too fast, is sometimes dangerous to cross the road. Additionally, in the night - even if our double glazed windows are closed - we awake multiple times by motorists, buses and other vehicles driving way too fast. Cars tends to shake due to the force of the speed over these bumps. Please adjust the speed bumps so they really force to slow down and maybe place speed cameras
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12-18, Regent's Park Road, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Number 96 mot properly sorting out their trash, 23rd August
item.description:
This is regular occurrence when number 96 will put the wrong waste in their bins and over fill the bin to the point the bin men do not take their rubbish. at night foxes get into their bins and cause this disgusting mess, or the wind blows it around.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Epstein Road, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Shrub cuttings thrown around trees, 23rd August
item.description:
The footpaths around the river area of Brooks Way near the Main Rd part of the river where cut back awhile ago but all the cuttings just thrown over the trees there making it look untidy and damage the lovely trees and shrubs in the ornamental garden which is cared for by friends of the park. Your gardeners coming to cut shrubs down but never take them away it looks very messy in the area and so needs taking away when you cut shrubs back not just thrown on the ornamental gardens .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Lemoge clinic, 23rd August
item.description:
I reported this issue to Camden back in june, then it got sent to Barnet, but I believe it falls under Brent. It's very noisy and hundreds of cars and lorry's go over it constantly. Please could it be fixed again. This is the 3rd time I've reported this manhole over the years. It is a constant problem especially with the amount of traffic. Please could this be fixed as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kilburn High Road, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bramble on grass by football pitch, 23rd August
item.description:
The brambles on the grass in St Paul’s Cray Recreation ground are taking over the grassed football pitch area plus all other areas footpaths etc . This park needs a good tidy up and cutting back of over grown weeds brambles and burdocks because it’s all looking very scruffy now . I don’t mind all the wild life framing for bees and butterflies but it’s now gone to far and left to just go to wild. The brambles catch on to your feet and dogs paws catch children in the face so it now all needs cutting down your grown level for safety reasons . Nights are drawing in Autumn/ Winters coming and it’s not safe for women to walk through with all these high shrubs and bushes plus their wrapping around decent trees and killing them,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: EartH Hackney is not controlling its patrons as they leave, causing a public nuisance., 23rd August
item.description:
I have no problem with EartH holding late events, in fact I fully support this, however it is not acceptable for people to be extra noisy for an hour after the event has finished. Please have security encourage them to go home. No security presence at al
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
